downloadTitle: Video: Customizing Default Field Templates in ASP.NET Dynamic Data Applications
downloadDescription: This video shows how to customize the UI for displaying, editing, and inserting when you use field templates in an ASP.NET Dynamic Data application.  See Related Resources for documentation and for a code example that accompanies this video.
detailsSection: ASP.NET Dynamic Data displays data fields by using field templates. This video shows how to change the UI for displaying, editing, or inserting by customizing the default field templates.
installInstructionSection: • Click the Download button on this page to start the video.

relatedResourcesSection.title: how to: Customize ASP.NET Dynamic Data Default Field Templates
